contract_description: The Supplier shall provide the following products/services to the Buyer: Product X010, Product Y010, Product Z010.
objective: To provide products/services to the Buyer with agreed pricing and volume discounts.
pricing_and_payment_terms: Product X010: $15 per unit, Product Y010: $25 per unit, Product Z0010: $35 per unit. Payment Terms: The Buyer shall make payments to the Supplier within 45 days from the receipt of a valid invoice. Payment Method: Payments shall be made via PayPal.
delivery_terms: The Supplier shall submit invoices to the Buyer for the products/services provided as per the agreed-upon pricing and terms.
termination_clause: Either party may terminate this Contract with 60 days written notice to the other party. Either party may terminate this Contract immediately in the event of a material breach by the other party.
